abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.75.2 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.76.0
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.75.2 release.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.75.2 release.

screen.phrase: fix my capitalization mistake
Changing bn_in.xml to bn_IN.xml to match what's in svn
Update localization sources
Fixed bug in output-orderedlist-starting-number template (@startingnumber did not work for FO).
Moved warning.
Removed obsolete reference to DBTeXMath.
Added fix to catch ID also of descendants of listitem. Closes bug #2955077.
Stripped down, faster version of gentext.template is used when there is no localization customization.
Hopefully this way code will work in Xalan and without speed penalty.
Removed unused XJPARSEFLAGS.
Added support for Georgian based on patch #2917147.
Another small speed improvement
Workaround bug in Xalan-J. Path to locale files is written in a way it produces same absolute URI whether base URI is in .../common or .../html or .../fo directory.
Change entities to use common/entities.ent.
Added fix that preserves link/@role (makes links in the reference documentation with @role="tcg" work).
Fixed bugs related to manpages and L10n.
Removed typo
Upgraded to use common entities. Fixed bug when some code used @sortas and some not for grouping/sorting of indexterms.

para.literal: Jirka Kosek: l10n.xsl; l10n.dtd; l10n.xml; autoidx-kosek.xsl

screen.phrase: Refactored localization support. Language files are loaded on demand. Speedup is about 30%.
Added xsl:keys for improved performance of localization texts look up. Performance gain around 15%.
Fixed bug #2912677 (error with xref in title).
Fix bug in xrefstyle "title" handling introduced with the 'insert.targetdb.data' template.
Fix bug in xref to equation without title to use context="xref-number" instead of "xref-number-and-title".
Number all equations in one sequence, with or without title.
Fix bug #2896909 where duplicate @sortas on indexterms caused some indexterms to drop out of index.
Expand the "Stripping namespace ..." message to advise users to use the namespaced stylesheets.
need a local version of $exsl.node.set.available variable because this module imported many places.
Added /node() to the select expression that is used to compute the title text so that no <ttl> elements end up in the output. Closes bug #2830119.
Add Icelandic

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.75.2 release.

screen.phrase: Remove the namespace mistakingly added with the last upload.
Properly number acknowledgements page and start with page 1.
Fix bug 2979166 able - Attribute @rowheader not working
Improved glossterm auto-linking by using keys. The old code was inefficient when processing documents with many inline glossterms.
Fix bug 2805530 author/orgname not appearing on title page.
Added support for SVG content in imagedata (inspired by patch #2909154).
Removed superfluous test used when computing column-width. Closes bug #3000898.
Added missing <xsl:call-template name="anchor"/>. Closes bug #2998567.
Added table-layout="fixed" on segmentedlist table (required by XSL spec when proportional-column-width() is used).
Change entities to use common/entities.ent.
Upgraded to use common entities. Fixed bug when some code used @sortas and some not for grouping/sorting of indexterms.
Upgraded to use common entities. Fixed bug when some code used @sortas and some not for grouping/sorting of indexterms.
Fix bug in olink template when an olink has an id. Add warning message with id value when trying to link to an element that has no generated text.
Fixed bug #2930968 (indexterm in refmeta not handled correctly).
fix bug 2949567 title in revhistory breaks FO transform.
Output id attributes on glossdiv blocks so they can be added to xrefs or TOC.
Enabled hyphenation of URLs when ulink content is the same as link target
Apply patch to turn off row recursion if no @morerows attributes present. This will enable very large tables without row spanning to process without running into recursion limits.
Format equation without title using table layout with equation number next to the equation.
Add equation.number.properties.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.75.2 release.

screen.phrase:
Modified acknowledgements template to avoid invalid output (

in

).
Added default sidebar attribute-sets.
Fix bug 2979166 able - Attribute @rowheader not working
Fix bug 3033191 footnotes in html tables.
Improved glossterm auto-linking by using keys. The old code was inefficient when processing documents with many inline glossterms.
Fix bug 2844927 Validity error for callout bugs.
Convert formal.object.heading to respect make.clean.html param.
Fix bug 2840768 sidebar without title inserts empty b tag.
Moved the template that outputs <base> so that the base URI also applies to relative CSS paths that come later. See patch #2896121.
Change entities to use common/entities.ent.
Upgraded to use common entities. Fixed bug when some code used @sortas and some not for grouping/sorting of indexterms.
fix bug 2948363 generated filename for refentry not unique, when used in a set.
Fix missing "Chapter n" label when use chapter/info/title.
Row recursion turned off if no @morerows attributes in the table. This will prevent failure on long table (with no @morerows) due to excessive depth of recursion.
Support make.clean.html in autotoc.xsl.
Add support for make.clean.html setting in block elements.
Remove debug message.
Stock CSS styles for DocBook HTML output when 'make.clean.html' is non-zero.
Add templates for generating CSS files.
Add templates for generating CSS files and links to them.
Fix bugs in new entity references.
List of Equations now includes on equations with titles.
Add new params for CSS file generation.
If a colspec has a colname attribute, add it to the HTML col element as a class attribute so it can be styled.
Replace tabs with spaces.
Fix bug 2825842 where table footnotes not appearing in HTML-coded table.
Fix bug #2834826 where appendix inside part was not chunked as it should be.
Added missing namespace declarations. Closes bug #2890069.
Updated the template for footnote paras to use the 'paragraph' template. Closes bug #2803739.
Add more namespace names to the exclude-result-prefixes attribute.

Remove <b> and <i> elements "discouraged in favor of style sheets" from XHTML, XHTML 1.1 (and therefore EPUB) outputs by changing html2xhtml.xsl.
Fixes bug #2873153: No <b> and <i> tags in XHTML/EPUB
Added regression to EPUB specs:
Fixed bug #2844916 (don't output @target if ulink.target is empty).
Fix a bug when using index.on.type: an 'index symbols' section was created even if that typed index didn't include any symbols (they were in the other types).

sect2.title: Manpages
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.75.2 release.

screen.phrase: Modified the write.stubs template so that the section directory name is not output twice. Should fix bug #2831602. Also ensured that $lang is added to the .so path (when man.output.lang.in.name.enabled=1).
Fixed bug #2412738 (apostrophe escaping) by applying the submitted patch.
Fixed bugs related to manpages and L10n.
Fix bug where simpara in footnote didn't work. Patch by Jonathan Nieder, jrnieder@gmail.com

Fix two indentation issues: In the first case there is no corresponding .RS macro (Debian #519438, sf.net 2793873). In the second case an .RS instead of the probably intended .sp leads to an indentation bug (Debian #527309, sf.net #2642139).

sect2.title: Epub
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the epub code since the 1.75.2 release.

screen.phrase: Resolve some actual regressions in date output spotted by more recent versions of epubcheck
Working toward getting the automated test suite working in Windows
Updates to install instructions
Trying to make the testing environment runnable on Windows machines
Updated mediaobject selection code that better uses roles (when available); based on contributons by Glenn McDonald
Ensure that NCX documents are always outputted with a default namespace to prevent problems with the kindlegen machinery
Adding support for partintros with sect2s, 3s, etc
Adding param to workaround horrific ADE bug with the inability to process
Add support for authorgroup/author in OPF metadata (via Michael Wiedmann)

Remove <b> and <i> elements "discouraged in favor of style sheets" from XHTML, XHTML 1.1 (and therefore EPUB) outputs by changing html2xhtml.xsl.
Fixes bug #2873153: No <b> and <i> tags in XHTML/EPUB
Added regression to EPUB specs:

para.literal: Keith Fahlgren: bin/lib/docbook.rb; bin/spec/files/DejaVuSerif-Italic.otf; docbook.xsl; bi⋯

screen.phrase:
This resolves bug #2873142, Please add support for multiple embedded fonts
If you navigate to a checkout of DocBook-XSL and go to: xsl/epub/bin/spec/files You can now run the following command:
../../dbtoepub -f DejaVuSerif.otf -f DejaVuSerif-Italic.otf -c test.css -s test_cust.xsl orm.book.001.xml
In dbtoepub, the following option can be used more than once: -f, --font [OTF FILE] Embed OTF FILE in .epub.
The underlying stylesheet now accepts a comma-separated list of font file names rather than just one as the RENAMED epub.embedded.fonts ('s' added).
The runnable EPUB spec now includes: - should be valid .epub after including more than one embedded font
Improve the selection of cover images when working in DocBook 4.x land (work in progress)
Improve the quality of the OPF spine regression by ensuring that the spine elements for deeply nested refentries are in order and adjacent to their opening wrapper XHTML chunk.

Add more careful handling of refentries to ensure that they always appear in the opf:spine. This was only a problem when refentries were pushed deep into the hierarchy (like inside a sect2), but presented navigational problems for many reading systems (despite the correct NCX references). This may *not* be the best solution, but attacking a better chunking strategy for refentries was too big a nut to crack at this time.
Fix a bug when using index.on.type: an 'index symbols' section was created even if that typed index didn't include any symbols (they were in the other types).

sect2.title: Eclipse
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the eclipse code since the 1.75.2 release.

screen.phrase: Added SVN keywords.

Added a stylesheet module that generates plug-ins conforming to the standard (OSGi-based) Eclipse 3.x architecture. The main difference to the older format is that metadata is stored in a separate manifest file. The module imports and extends the existing eclipse.xsl module. Based on code contributed in patch #2624668.
